channel.title: Leetcode on star67
channel.description: Recent content in Leetcode on star67

item.title: [Leetcode] 2407. Longest Increasing Subsequence II
item.description: LIS (longest increasing subsequence) 是一個經典的 dp 問題，題目簡述是，給定一個陣列並允許刪除其中某些元素，能夠構成最長的嚴格遞增陣列的長度是多少？詳細的可以參考 這題，本題是基於 LIS 的變化，新增了序列中兩個元素的差 k。

item.title: [Leetcode] 300. Longest Increasing Subsequence
item.description:
Given an integer array nums, return the length of the longest strictly increasing subsequence.

A subsequence is a sequence that can be derived from an array by deleting some or no elements without changing the order of the remaining elements. For example, [3,6,2,7] is a subsequence of the array [0,3,1,6,2,2,7].
